div.div: St. Olaf College vs. Augsburg College
at Minneapolis, Minn. | Edor Nelson Field

tr.td: Augsburg wins toss, defers; St. Olaf receives & defends east goal.
Brandon Searle kickoff 36 yards to the STO29, downed.
Nate Penz pass complete to Stephen Asp for 29 yards to the AUG42 (Avery Dorsett).
Nate Penz sacked for loss of 9 yards to the STO49 (John Milam; Spencer Corey).
